attributes.action: Allow a "no confidence vote" be added to all ballot cards for General and Local Elections
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Because of the current climate, a majority of the poulation have become disheartened with both the present government party, and the other two main political groups, because we have to vote but don't agree to any of the three parties then as a democratic society we should be allowed as a human right to say that we do not agree with any of the three parties policies be it generaly or localy.
Then maybe the governments of the future would and could say they have listened to the people who put them in power. work for and along side the people of britian instead of for european, & american policies/government
If this petition is allowed to be presented then all political parties would be able to adjust accordingly to the people of the united kingdoms views and voice for once and maybe forever.
